exportEDocToFile
The function generates a printed form file (hereinafter - PF) based on the PF document.
The function returns an object  of
“File” type
[FS_FILE].
The PF file generated based on the PF document can be exported directly from the document editor by clicking the
button in the control panel.
Syntax
exportEDocToFile
(rfDocument)
Setting
Purpose
rfDocument
Instance of the "Template-based document" type [RF_DOCUMENT] (or its ID), based on which the file will be generated.
Note
The function is called from the
"Documents and files"
tab of the Algorithm Editor toolbar.
The name of the created file will correspond to the settings of the PF template based on which the PF document was generated.
Use example
For example, when working with the "Loan Agreement" PF document it is required to generate a document file and attach it to the attribute of an instance of the “Client Form” type.
Previously, add an attribute of
“File” type
with the “Attachment” name to the “Client form” object type.
The algorithm of PF file generation will be as follows:
Other functions were also used to write this algorithm.
More.
Declaring the “ file_pf” variable is performed by the
var
function.
Saving the generated file is done via the
save
function.
Using the
attr
function with the “Set value” attribute, the "Attachment" attribute is assigned a value stored in the “file_pf” variable.
Current object
is saved by the
save
function.
As a result, the PF file generated based on the PF document, the name of which corresponds to the settings of the PF template, will be added to the "Attachment" attribute:
